localString.value: Forged only in the Black Valley by Gegnar Haffeud, the master dwarven smith, this armor is enchanted to protect the wearer especially against giants.
Forged only in the Black Valley by Gegnar Haffeud, the master dwarven smith, this armor is enchanted to protect the wearer especially against giants.

This weapon bears the mark of the dwarf Marrok, Master Blacksmith of Neverwinter's Shining Knight Arms and Armor. He forged it early in 1373 DR, to aid the heroes who sought to free his quarantined city from the virulent grasp of the so-called Wailing Death.
This is an oil flask. You may use it to refill a lantern, or try to light it and throw at someone
This is a standard lantern, you must refill it with oil every 6 hours of use.
This is a bedroll, to use it, drop it on the ground.
This is a bedroll. You can use it by placing it on the ground.
Hearty billows fan the forge-borne flames. The air is blisteringly hot, leaving you feel light-headed and not quite yourself.
Place this object in any area where you want tracking to occur. Set Will to the DC of tracking in this area.
